data.description: Workflow expression that filters of the event data (payload)

toStateData.description: Workflow expression that selects a state data element to which the event payload should be added/merged into. If not specified, denotes, the top-level state data element.

useData.description: If set to false, event payload is not added/merged to state data. In this case 'data' and 'toStateData' should be ignored. Default is true.
